review_en: You need to sell your footwork. There's a mix of cheap and luxurious places. If you're looking for a luxurious design while maintaining the long-distance price, you can go to the 2nd basement floor of Hyosung Jewelry City and buy a decent coupling at a reasonable price.

review_en: I bought a ring at Jongno Jewelry Street. I think it's a little cheaper than other places. I coated a 14K gold ring with platinum, and it was a little cheaper than near my house. Also, if platinum coating comes off, they will give you a free coating service. There are many pretty designs, so it's good to choose what you want to do. review: 압도적 인 금 보석류 경험 우리는 서울에있는 동안 종로 보석 지역을 치기로 결정했습니다. 그 경험은 내가 생각했던 모든 것과 훨씬 더 많은 것이 었습니다. – 그것은 엄청나게 압도적이었습니다. 나는 내 인생에서 그렇게 많은 보석을 본 적이 없다. 그들은 또한 1kg의 금괴와 같은 물건을 팔았으므로 1 킬로 또는 2 킬로의 금이 부족하면 여기에서 얻을 수 있습니다. 유용한 정보: * "점포"는 실제로 여러 공급 업체가있는 방이며 값진 부스가있는 실내 시장과 같습니다. * 여러 곳이 실제로 도매되어 있으며 주말에 판매하지
review_en: 0Overwhelming Gold Jewelry Experience We decided to hit Jongno Jewelry Area while in Seoul.The experience was much more than I thought.– It was overwhelming.I've never seen so many jewels in my life.They also sold items such as a 1kg gold bullion, so if they lack 1kg or 2kg of gold, they can get it here.A useful information store is actually a room with several suppliers and is like an indoor market with a valuable booth.Several places are actually wholesale and sold on weekends.
